parts.questionText: Rewrite the following code after correcting the errors.

Identify the invalid variable names from the following. Mention the reasons that make them invalid.
 
    sum_of_digit , switch , calculate sum , _value_ , Sum,  calculate-sum , 1st_sum
Compute the values of the variables a, b, c, and d.
Find the output of the following C code segment.
Re-write the given C code segment in Q.2(a) using the “if-else” statement without changing the logical meaning and output.

Write  a  complete  program  to print the  following  series  up  to nth term. Find the sum of  the series.
Sample Input n = 6
Sample Output 0, 5, 18, 39, 68, 105 

Your program will also find the sum.
Manually  trace the  following  code. Show changes of all  the  variables (i, j,  count) in  each step.
Manually trace the given code segment. Show the changes of all the variables (i, j , size, arr elements) in each step.

Write  a  program  that reads n from  user. Take n  inputs into an  array  named marks of  size 100, where n<=100. Find the maximum and its index of the even values of the array.

Sample Input 

6 
1  10  6  51  24  13 

Your program should find max = 24, at index 4.
Draw a flowchart for the code segment given below.

Write a C program to display the following ‘Y’ pattern for n.
Sample
Input
Sample Output
For, n=3
*  *
 *
 *

For, n=5
*    *
 *  *
  *
  *
  *
